lead_paragraph: West Indies spurned the chance to make the final day of the drawn third test into a genuine contest by turning down Australia's offer to chase a victory target of 370 from 70 overs at the Sydney Cricket Ground on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: West Indies Spurn Australia Double Declaration Offer
headline.main: West Indies Spurn Australia Double Declaration Offer
